scripts.copy-assets: cp -R assets docs/ && cp -R assets dist/
scripts.css: npm run css-compile-light && npm run css-compile-dark && npm run css-compile-docs && npm run css-compile-docs-dark
scripts.css-compile-dark: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 sass/fabric-dark.scss dist/assets/css/fabric-dark.css
scripts.css-compile-docs: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 sass/fabric-light.scss docs/assets/css/fabric-light.css
scripts.css-compile-docs-dark: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 sass/fabric-dark.scss docs/assets/css/fabric-dark.css
scripts.css-compile-light: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 sass/fabric-light.scss dist/assets/css/fabric-light.css
scripts.prefix: postcss dist/assets/css/fabric-light.css --use autoprefixer -o dist/assets/css/fabric-light.css && postcss dist/assets/css/fabric-dark.css --use autoprefixer -o dist/assets/css/fabric-dark.css && postcss docs/assets/css/fabric-light.css --use autoprefixer -o docs/assets/css/fabric-light.css && postcss dist/assets/css/fabric-dark.css --use autoprefixer -o dist/assets/css/fabric-dark.css
